title: How to Make Breadfruit Chips

steps.headline: Peel the skin off the breadfruit and cut the breadfruit into quarters.
steps.description: Soak these pieces in water for ten minutes.

steps.headline: Have the salt water ready.
steps.description: Add a little turmeric powder and put it aside.

steps.headline: Cut the breadfruit into thin slices and deep fry them in oil.
steps.description: When the chips are almost finished, add a spoonful of the salt water.

steps.headline: Remove the chips from the oil and add the chili or pepper powder for taste.
Let the chips cool and enjoy!

text: Peel the skin off the breadfruit and cut the breadfruit into quarters. Soak these pieces in water for ten minutes. Have the salt water ready. Add a little turmeric powder and put it aside. Cut the breadfruit into thin slices and deep fry them in oil. When the chips are almost finished, add a spoonful of the salt water. Remove the chips from the oil and add the chili or pepper powder for taste.  Let the chips cool and enjoy!
